statements: DELETE FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData WHERE id = 1 AND production_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM GeothermalEnergyProductionData WHERE production_value < 1000 AND location = 'California';
DELETE FROM GeothermalProduction WHERE production_date < '2021-01-01' AND temperature_celsius > 150
DELETE FROM geothermal_projects WHERE location = 'California' AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' AND technician_name = 'John Doe';
